Posts.Content: Jul 23, 2011 08:17AM pink4ever wrote: I started the Zometa infusions from the get-go with my Herceptin and Taxol and Carboplatin (yes, 7 hours in the chemo chair, once a week for 3 weeks then a week off) I began my treatments in Feb of 2010 and finished the chemo in Aug 2010. I continue taking the Herceptin and Zometa every 3 weeks, and Femera daily.  The side effects of the Zometa disappeared after the first few treatments but my nurse gave me great advise.  Push the water intake 24 hours before and after the treatment and if necessary request they give the dose over a longer period of time (30 minutes vs 15).  The benefits FAR exceed any SE.  My dentist keeps a close tab on any SE but assures me they are extremely rare.  Just have to have any major dental work (extractions or root canal) done prior to starting.  It is important to continue regular cleaning - in fact I go every 3 months now. Best of luck!
